title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Course ContentLeadership: leadership in corporate, society, science and technology, who is leader and what does it mean to be leader; Theories: trait, behavioural, contingency/ situational; Power, politics, networking, negotiation and leadership effectiveness; Charismatic, transformational and ethical leadership; trust and leadership; Team-based leadership, on-line leadership; Leadership, culture, diversity and learning organisation; Effective leadership.
